Package com.game.score

Class Score

java.lang.Object
com.game.score.Score
public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
Ensures real time score update during the game.
Author:
hcywy2

  • Method Details

    • createTimer

      public void createTimer()
      Displays Pop-Up Highscore window and calls Background.checkNextLevel(). Conditions were added to slow down the refresh rate of the AnimationTimer.
      See Also:
      Highscore, PopUpHighscore

    • start

      public void start()
      Creates and starts AnimationTimer.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops AnimationTimer.

    • setNumber

      public void setNumber​(int n)
      Displays the real time score in the game.
      Parameters:
      n - Current score.

    • getPopUpHighscore

      public PopUpHighscore getPopUpHighscore()
      Gets PopUpHighscore object.
